content:
This was posted to #t-compiler/help, and I moved it to #general, but I also wanted to make sure more folks saw it:
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/122651-general/topic/OpenSSF.20MFA.20Hardware.20Donation.20to.20Critical.20OSS.20Projects
I'd be interested in getting and trying one. Seems like someone should collate who all in the project wants one?
Or at least gauge a sufficient consensus to confirm "do at least 5 people want one".
I dont think there's a minimum. Just a max of 5 of each key
